name: Dragon's Dungeon: Awakening
description: Dragon's Dungeon is a hardcore adventure for roguelikes connoisseurs and RPG fans. Fight with the monsters, explore the labyrinths in search of new equipment and priceless treasures, improve your skills using a non-standard system of character development and gain victory over the dungeon lord.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
